roleset.name: hold or distort something so as to form angles, formation of angles

example.name: angulate-v
example.text: The operation angulates the duct and duodenum, causing strain on the suture line.
example.arg: causing strain on the suture line

example.name: angulation-n
example.text: The fracture on the left has resulted in angulation of the distal component;

example.name: angulation-n: with arg2
example.text: Consider reduction even for less than 40 degree angulation;

example.name: angulated-j:
example.text: The lack of accessory cell will distinguish it at once from all the other genera of larger insects in which the wings are not angulated.
